jukugoList.components: 撲 (eradicate) + 滅 (annihilate) = 撲滅 (eradicate)
相 (partner) + 撲 (eradicate) = 相撲 (Sumo)

kunyomiList.definition: In theory, the kunyomi of dragon is TATSU - but oddly it's never used ABOUT DRAGONS THEMSELVES. For example, if you see a dragon, you have to use the ON yomi - 'Hey! It's a ryuu!' However - CONFUSINGLY - some jukugo - such as 'seahorse' and 'tornado' use this kunyomi (TATSU). . . .It's basically the reverse of how kun and on are usually used. COCK

jukugoList.components: 恐 (dread) + 竜 (dragon) = 恐竜 (dinosaur!! )
竜 (dragon) + 巻 (roll up) = 竜巻 (whirlwind)

kunyomiList.definition: waterfall

jukugoList.components: 電 (electricity) + 車 (car) = 電車 (train)
電 (electricity) + 話 (conversation) = 電話 (telephone)
電 (electricity) + 気 (mood) = 電気 (electricity)
電 (electricity) + 池 (pond) = 電池 (battery)

kunyomiList.definition: me (only used by guys or scandalous blue-collar grandmas (or anyone imitating those groups)
turtle
rope

jukugoList.components: 縄 (rope) + 跳 (leap up) = 縄跳び (jump rope)
縄 (rope) + 張 (stretch) = 縄張り ( turf)
需 (demand) + 要 (important) = 需要 (demand)
必 (surely) + 需 (demand) + 品 (products) = 必需品 (necessities)

kunyomiList.definition: withstand something physical - Fire resistant, or water-resistant. People, too: if you try to be a coal-miner and you can't take the physical labor then you 耐えらない。 1/2 KANA

jukugoList.components: 忍 (hide / endure) + 耐 (withstand) = 忍耐 (forbear, endure)
耐 (withstand) + 久 (been a long time) + 性 (sex / essential nature) = 耐久性 (durability)

kunyomiList.definition: edge (always literal, never figurative) (of your seat, edge of the plank) As opposed to 縁（fuchi) 、　端 usually refers to ONE POINT on the edge, the most extreme point (i.e. edge of the cliff, tip of the peninsula)

jukugoList.components: 中 (middle) + 途 (on the way) + 半 (half) + 端 (the edge) = 中途半端 (half-assed job)
極 (extreme) + 端 (the edge) = 極端 (extreme)

kunyomiList.hiragana: ( を　・　に ) つつ*む
kunyomiList.definition: to wrap

jukugoList.components: 小 (small size) + 包 (wrap) = 小包 (a package)
包 (wrap) + 丁 (nail) = 包丁 (kitchen knife, cutlery)
細 (slender) + 胞 (cell) = 細胞 (cell)

kunyomiList.definition: bubble, or a froth of hella bubbles 1/2 KANA

jukugoList.components: 大 (big) + 砲 (cannon) = 大砲 (cannon)

kunyomiList.definition: to get sick of something 1/2 KANA

kunyomiList.hiragana: ( を　or が ) かか＊える
kunyomiList.definition: to embrace, to grasp
hug
metaphorically hold (a suspicion, a belief, a grudge) 1/2 KANA
chest / breasts

jukugoList.components: 度 (times) + 胸 (chest/breast) = 度胸 (courageous)
文 (culture/ sentence) + 句 (verse of a poem) = 文句 (complain)
禁 (prohibition) + 句 (verse of a poem) = 禁句 (forbidden, tabboo word)
俳 (actor) + 句 (verse of a poem) = 俳句 (haiku)
尊敬 (respect) + 語 (language) = 尊敬語 (formal Japanese)
尊 (esteem) + 敬 (respect) = 尊敬 (respect)
警 (the fuzz) + 察 (police) = 警察 (police)
警察 (police) + 署 (government office) = 警察署 (police station)
警 (the fuzz) + 告 (inform) = 警告 (admonition)
警 (the fuzz) + 視 (peer at) + 庁 (metropolitan government) = 警視庁 (metro police)

kunyomiList.definition: to be shocked, surprised (驚いた！＝I was suprised!)
to shock or astonish motherfuckers

jukugoList.components: 驚 (astonish) + 嘆 (lament, sigh) = 驚嘆 (amazemenｔ)
結 (bind) + 局 (department) = 結局 (in the end, or "after all")
郵 (mail) + 便 (convenient　/ poop) + 局 (department) = 郵便局 (post office)
薬 (medicine) + 局 (department) = 薬局 (pharmacy)
拘 (put in custody) + 留 (absent / stopped) = 拘留 (put in custody )
拘 (put in custody) + 束 (bundle of sticks) = 拘束 (restrain/restrict)

kunyomiList.definition: meaning, when something is in season i.e. fruit LAZYSUF

jukugoList.components: 下 (below) + 旬 (in season/ time of month) = 下旬 (end of month)
上 (above) + 旬 (in season/ time of month) = 上旬 (beginning of month)
中 (middle) + 旬 (in season/ time of month) = 中旬 (middle of the month)
陶 (pottery) + 器 (instrument) = 陶器 (pottery)

kunyomiList.definition: Smell this! Does this milk smell fresh?
a smell. Sometimes bad, sometimes, good. Usually not so good.
something which is/should be wet , becomes dry: My eyes are dry. My throat is dry. Usually only used when you are thirsty, as in: のどが渇いてる!のど が かわいてる! I'm thirsty!

kunyomiList.hiragana: やく ( XXX に or で )
kunyomiList.definition: roughly speaking. Ish. 約9yards。 約3 days。 PRE

jukugoList.components: 約 (promise/ roughly speaking) + 束 (bundle of sticks) = 約束 (promise)
予 (beforehand) + 約 (promise/ roughly speaking) = 予約 (reservation)
婚 (marriage) + 約 (promise/ roughly speaking) = 婚約 (marriage engagement)
条 (clause) + 約 (promise/ roughly speaking) = 条約 (a treaty or pact)

kunyomiList.definition: objective, target

jukugoList.components: 目 (eye) + 的 (motivation / '-al') = 目的 (motive, not only for crimes.)
自 (my own) + 動 (movement) + 的 (motivation / '-al') = 自動的 (automatic)
理 (reason) + 想 (idea/imagination) + 的 (motivation / '-al') = 理想的 (ideal.)
基 (basis) + 本 (book / the real) + 的 (motivation / '-al') = 基本的 (the basics)
合 (to suit) + 理 (reason) + 的 (motivation / '-al') = 合理的 (rational OR reasonable )

kunyomiList.definition: the act of fishin' (n)
to fish (v)

jukugoList.components: 平 (equal / level) + 均 (average) = 平均 (an average)
均 (average) + 等 (equal /etc./plural) = 均等 (uniform, even)

kunyomiList.definition: plate

jukugoList.components: 灰 (ash/ gray) + 皿 (plate) = 灰皿 (ashtray)

kunyomiList.definition: to steal - in a sneaky, burglar way

jukugoList.components: 強 (burly) + 盗 (steal by stealth) = 強盗 (jack fools)
盗 (steal by stealth) + 撮 (photo-shoot) = 盗撮 (hidden camera)
盗 (steal by stealth) + 作 (make) = 盗作 (plagiarism )

kunyomiList.definition: also abbreviated to あったかい: warm thing (puppy, or puddle under your bed )
I warm up (the muffins)
something gets warmed up

jukugoList.components: 温 (hot or warm thing) + 度 (times) = 温度 (temperature)
温 (hot or warm thing) + 泉 (spring) = 温泉 (hot spring bath)
同 (same) + 盟 (oath) = 同盟 (alliance)
連 (take with / inform of) + 盟 (oath) = 連盟 (a federation)

kunyomiList.definition: a heaping bowl of food / a raging fire / something overflowing with solids (but not liquids - that's a different kanji with the same pronunciation! 漏る！！！）
robust, active, overflowing with something-or-other : A flurry of applause, a fire vigorous enough to roast an ox, a flowering of culture.

jukugoList.components: 盛 (heaps of!) + 上 (above) = 盛り上がる (to liven up)
盛 (heaps of!) + マ () = 盛りマン (bulging pudenda)

kunyomiList.definition: salt, motherfucker. Salt

jukugoList.components: 監 (oversee) + 督 (supervisor) = 監督 (director)
監 (oversee) + 視 (peer at) = 監視 (to supervise)
印 (stamp) + 鑑 (expert opinion) = 印鑑 (chop / seal)
図 (diagram/ map) + 鑑 (expert opinion) = 図鑑 (a field guide)
鑑 (expert opinion) + 賞 (prize) = 鑑賞 (discriminating eye)
鑑 (expert opinion) + 定 (plan) = 鑑定 (expert opinion)

kunyomiList.definition: blood

jukugoList.components: 血 (blood) + 液 (liquid) + 型 (type / proper way) = 血液型 (blood type)
出 (pull out / hand over) + 血 (blood) = 出血 (to bleed)
吸 (suck) + 血 (blood) + 鬼 (demon) = 吸血鬼 (vampire)
鼻 (nose) + 血 (blood) = 鼻血 (nosebleed)
大 (big) + 衆 (populace) = 大衆 (general public.)
利 (handy) + 益 (profit) = 利益 (profit)
有 (exist) + 益 (profit) = 有益 (beneficial)

kunyomiList.definition: overflow (also you can use it if you are a lady who is, um, - it's the femenine equivalent of 'boioioioioioingggg!')
compliment - no, wait, fuck it. Most dictionaries list both 褒める　and 誉める as kanjis for 'compliment' but in practice only 褒める　is used. How's that for disambiguation?

jukugoList.components: 名 (name, famous) + 誉 (honor) = 名誉 (honor/prestige)

kunyomiList.definition: To metaphorically bring up something (an objection, a point) to give an example of , to cite or mention something. But also - irritatingly - to literally raise one's hand (Oo! Oo! I know ! I know!) However, if you're raising anything else BUT your hand, you have to use 上げる instead of 挙げる. Yeah, I know, I know. What can you do?? NP
something gets cited or mentioned in a report or article.

jukugoList.components: 選 (choose) + 挙 (raise / cite/ mention) = 選挙 (an election)

kunyomiList.definition: boat.
ship

jukugoList.components: 風 (wind / the flu / style) + 船 (ship) = 風船 (balloon)
宇宙 (outer space) + 船 (ship) = 宇宙船 (space ship)
航 (navigation) + 海 (ocean) = 航海 (nautical)
航 (navigation) + 法 (law) = 航法 (navigation)
一般 (generally, commonly) + 的 (motivation / '-al') = 一般的 (ordinary)
一 (one) + 般 (general / overall) = 一般 (generally, commonly)

kunyomiList.definition: tray LAZY

jukugoList.components: 円 (yen/circle) + 盤 (tray / basis) = 円盤 (a UFO)
基 (basis) + 盤 (tray / basis) = 基盤 (the base or foundation)

kunyomiList.definition: cat 1/2 KANA

jukugoList.components: 子 (child) + 猫 (cat) = 子猫 (kitten)
招 (beckon) + 猫 (cat) = 招き猫 (shop-window cat)
猫 (cat) + 舌 (tongue) = 猫舌 (no hot food for me!)
野 (field) + 良 (good) + 猫 (cat) = 野良猫 (stray cat)
猛 (fierce) + 烈 (violently intense) = 猛烈 (fierce )
卑 (despicable) + 猥 (obscene) = 卑猥 (obscene)

kunyomiList.definition: monkey 1/2 KANA

jukugoList.components: 猿 (monkey) + 真 (really) + 似 (resemble) = 猿真似 (Monkey see, monkey do!)

kunyomiList.definition: to hunt
someone who is insane since childhood. Ted Bundy or whoever. They might seem normal at first.

jukugoList.components: 露 (outdoors, public) + 出 (pull out / hand over) + 狂 (go nuts) = 露出狂 (exhibitionist)
発 (launch) + 狂 (go nuts) = 発狂 (mental breakdown)

kunyomiList.definition: Alone. Unlike the other hitori (一人)、　独り has a sort of lonlely value judgement on it. Like, 'He lives by himself' or 'She had to do the whole thing herself (since no one would help her)' 1/2 KANA

jukugoList.components: 独 (solitary) + 身 ((one's own) flesh) = 独身 (single, unmarried)
独 (solitary) + 言 (say) = 独り言 (talking to yourself)
独 (solitary) + 特 (special) = 独特 (unique)
独 (solitary) + 立 (stand up) = 独立 (autonomous)
地 (area) + 獄 (hell) = 地獄 (hell)
投 (throw) + 獄 (hell) = 投獄 (throw someone in prison)

kunyomiList.definition: get or obtain :Unlike the OTHER える(得る ), 獲る is used for　 hunting - the predator obtains prey. Also sometimes used about sports victories.

jukugoList.components: 獲 (prey on　/ get) + 得 (bargain　/ obtain) = 獲得 (acquire)
獲 (prey on　/ get) + 物 (animal / thing) = 獲物 (prey)

kunyomiList.definition: narrow or cramped 1/2 KANA
commit or perpetrate - usually used with rape, so be careful how you use this.

jukugoList.components: 犯 (commit a crime) + 人 (person) = 犯人 (criminal)
防 (ward off) + 犯 (commit a crime) = 防犯 (anti-crime)
犯 (commit a crime) + 罪 (sin) = 犯罪 (crime)

kunyomiList.definition: a logo or symbol - as in a check mark on a list, or a cross, or the black flag logo

jukugoList.components: 印 (stamp) + 鑑 (expert opinion) = 印鑑 (chop / seal)
第一 (first or primary) + 印象 (impression) = 第一印象 (first impression.)

kunyomiList.definition: beat (rain beats on the windowpane), hit (used specifically with drums), smack or slap (your Dad for mistakes in life) KANA

jukugoList.components: 引 (pull) + 叩 (beat, smack) = 引っ叩く (bitch-slap)

kunyomiList.definition: egg (used mostly by farmers and agriculture people)
instead, all the more (better or worse) KANA

jukugoList.components: 却 (disregard) + 下 (below) = 却下 (reject, dismiss.)

1472.eng: standard / the best way to do

jukugoList.components: 範 (standard / the best way to do) + 囲 (surround) = 範囲 (extent, scope,)
模 (model) + 範 (standard / the best way to do) = 模範 (model - prototype)
御 (the honorific "o") + 飯 (rice / meal) = 御飯 (rice)
御 (the honorific "o") + 手 (hand) + 洗 (wash) = 御手洗い (toilet, man. Toilet!!!!!!!)
御 (the honorific "o") + 覧 (view) = 御覧 (please look sir)
御 (the honorific "o") + 免 (exemption / license) = 御免なさい (sorry)

kunyomiList.definition: arm. Also, to be good at something, as in, "xxxの 腕 が いい!" "She's good at xxx!"

jukugoList.components: 腕 (arm / skill) + 章 (emblem / chapter) = 腕章 (armband)
腕 (arm / skill) + 力 (strong) = 腕力 (muscle/force - literal, not figurative.)

kunyomiList.definition: immediately XXX will happen. (you don't need a particle for this)

jukugoList.components: 即 (immediately) + 興 (interest) = 即興 (to improvise!)
季 (season) + 節 (season / joint) = 季節 (season)
関 (connected to) + 節 (season / joint) = 関節 (joint)
厄 (misfortune) + 介 (introduce / intervene) = 厄介 (hard to deal with)

kunyomiList.definition: dangerous. Although, in a society where grown people spend their lives listening to loudspeakers telling them "Please watch your step," the notion of dangerous is broad enough to be meaningless.
on the brink of disaster or collapse. 1/2 KANA

jukugoList.components: 危 (dangerous) + 機 (machine) = 危機 (social crisis)
危 (dangerous) + 険 (steep / risky) = 危険 (risky, unsafe)

kunyomiList.definition: inhibit or suppress (a behavior or desire) (one's true feelings)

jukugoList.components: 抑 (suppress) + 圧 (pressure) = 抑圧 (oppression)
抑 (suppress) + 制 (system) = 抑制 (suppressor)

kunyomiList.definition: To pick someone up, like at the airport or bus stop!

jukugoList.components: 仰 (pompous / look up to) + 天 (heaven) = 仰天 (flabbergasted )
信 (believe) + 仰 (pompous / look up to) = 信仰 (religious faith)

kunyomiList.definition: clothes LAZY

jukugoList.components: 制 (system) + 服 (clothes) = 制服 (uniform)
私 (me / private) + 服 (clothes) + 警察 (police) = 私服警察 (plainclothes police, detectives.)

kunyomiList.definition: to report (on tv or a newspaper)

Oddly -despite the 'i' at the end, this is NOT an adjective. It's a noun, meaning, "Just desserts." Like, "In Catholicism, it's Saint Peter that stands at the gate of Heaven and gives both the saints and sinners their 報い！”

jukugoList.components: 情 (emotion) + 報 (data) = 情報 (data)
予 (beforehand) + 報 (data) = 予報 (forecast, prediction)
報 (data) + 道 (street) = 報道 (news report)

kunyomiList.definition: to aim for (literally or figuratively) 1/2 KANA
one's aim or motivation (whether good or bad)
team or group.

jukugoList.components: 番 (number) + 組 (one's team) = 番組 (tv program)
組 (one's team) + 織 (organization / weave) = 組織 (organization)
組 (one's team) + 合 (to suit) = 組合 (a union or association)

kunyomiList.definition: to stop the advance of something by physically obstructing it: The defensive lineman stopped the other team's football guy. The army checked the advance of the other army. Our vacation was stopped by the hurricane. NP1/2 KANA

jukugoList.components: 阻 (hamper) + 害 (damage) = 阻害 (an obstruction)

kunyomiList.definition: coarse or crude KANA

jukugoList.components: 粗 (rough texture / bad quality) + 品 (products) = 粗品 (a lame gift)
粗 (rough texture / bad quality) + 末 (the tip) = 粗末 (Shabby)
検 (investigate) + 査 (inspect) = 検査 (checkup)
調 (check out) + 査 (inspect) = 調査 (investigate)
捜 (search) + 査 (inspect) = 捜査 (criminal investigation)
査 (inspect) + 定 (plan) = 査定 (assess)

kunyomiList.definition: traditional Japanese flooring made from woven straw
I save him.
He is saved.　(usually used in the past tense: 助かった！ = Thanks for saving me!)

jukugoList.components: 助 (save) + 言 (say) = 助言 (advice)
援 (assist) + 助 (save) = 援助 (to assist)
助 (save) + 手 (hand) = 助手 (assistant)
先 (earlier/ the tip) + 祖 (ancestor) = 先祖 (one's family ancestors)
祖 (ancestor) + 先 (earlier/ the tip) = 祖先 (far-away ancestor)

jukugoList.definition: to ignore or snub someone or something.
jukugoList.components: 無 (without) + 視 (peer at) = 無視 (to ignore or snub someone or something.)
視 (peer at) + 界 (the world) = 視界 (field of view)

kunyomiList.definition: celebrate

jukugoList.components: 祝 (celebrate) + 日 (sun, day) = 祝日 (holiday)
会 (big meeting) + 社 (company) = 会社 (company)
社 (company) + 会 (big meeting) = 社会 (society)
社 (company) + 長 (long / boss) = 社長 (company boss.)
会社 (company) + 員 (clerk) = 会社員 (company worker)
株式 (stocks) + 会社 (company) = 株式会社 (a corporation)

kunyomiList.definition: to pray (used about Christians, but probably not Buddhists or Shinto), but also if you pray in class to pass a test, or pray "please let me catch that fly ball!") . . . .just like in English. 祈る Emphasizes the ACT of prayer, rather than the contents.

jukugoList.components: 祈 (pray) + 願 (beseech) = 祈願 (a wish)
福 (good luck) + 祉 (welfare) = 福祉 (social welfare programs.)
